name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Exam Room Teacher - Manage your exam environment
name.de: Exam Room Teacher - Verwalten Sie Ihre Prüfungsumgebung
name.es: Exam Room Teacher - Administra tu entorno de examen
name.fr: Exam Room Teacher - Gérez votre environnement d'examen
name.it: Exam Room Teacher - Gestisci il tuo ambiente d'esame

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Activate an exam environment and block/allow specific websites for all students in your class
short.de: Aktivieren Sie eine Prüfungsumgebung und blockieren/erlauben Sie bestimmte Websites für alle Schüler in Ihrer Klasse
short.es: Activa un entorno de examen y bloquea/permite sitios web específicos para todos los estudiantes de tu clase
short.fr: Activez un environnement d'examen et bloquez/autorisez des sites web spécifiques pour tous les étudiants de votre classe
short.it: Attiva un ambiente d'esame e blocca/consenti siti web specifici per tutti gli studenti della tua classe

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works with "Exam Room" and allows you to remotely control its activation or deactivation.
The perfect tool for teachers or training center managers to control internet access during an online exam such as the TOSA or other exams.
